metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9804 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description: In Firefox Developer Tools it is possible that pasting the result of the 'Copy as cURL' command into a command shell on macOS will cause the execution of unintended additional bash script commands if the URL was maliciously crafted. This is the result of an issue with the native version of Bash on macOS. *Note: This issue only affects macOS. Other operating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 66.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine seth-arnold> Only affects MacOS

criterions.comment: mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
